Package com.intellij.application.options.codeStyle

Class CustomizableLanguageCodeStylePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.application.options.CodeStyleAbstractPanel
      • com.intellij.application.options.codeStyle.CustomizableLanguageCodeStylePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentHighlightingListener, Disposable, CodeStyleSettingsCustomizable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CodeStyleBlankLinesPanel, OptionTableWithPreviewPanel, OptionTreeWithPreviewPanel

    public abstract class CustomizableLanguageCodeStylePanel
extends CodeStyleAbstractPanel
implements CodeStyleSettingsCustomizable
    Base class for code style settings panels supporting multiple programming languages.

        public void moveStandardOption(java.lang.String fieldName,
                               java.lang.String newGroup)
        Description copied from interface: CodeStyleSettingsCustomizable
        Moves a standard option to another group.
        Specified by:
        moveStandardOption in interface CodeStyleSettingsCustomizable
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The field name of the option to move (as defined in CommonCodeStyleSettings class).
        newGroup - The new group name (the group may be one of existing ones). A custom group name can be used if supported by consumer.
